meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a type.
meanings.sent1: The typy car had the same shape as all the other cars.
meanings.sent2: Her typy handwriting made it easy to recognize her notes.
meanings.sent3: The typy cat always sat in the same spot on the windowsill.
meanings.sent4: The typy clouds in the sky resembled fluffy cotton candy.
meanings.sent5: The typy flower stood out among the wildflowers with its unique petals.

meanings.definition: Having a particular type or style.
meanings.sent1: He preferred a typy shirt with bold patterns.
meanings.sent2: The typy house on the corner had a bright red door.
meanings.sent3: The typy lampshade added a pop of color to the room.
meanings.sent4: Her typy necklace sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The typy curtains matched perfectly with the furniture in the room.

meanings.definition: Showing a tendency to conform to a particular type.
meanings.sent1: The typy student always followed the same routine before exams.
meanings.sent2: His typy behavior made him predictable to his friends.
meanings.sent3: The typy clock on the wall never seemed to be wrong.
meanings.sent4: Her typy hairstyle was always neatly arranged in a bun.
meanings.sent5: The typy squirrel returned to the same tree every afternoon for nuts.
